```{r}
library(cyclone)
```

## Problems:

```{r}
probs
```

## Creating new problem instances:

```{r}
prob <- create_cmop(probs$standard.050, eskal.instance = 2)
prob
```

## Check default:

```{r}
values <- fun_cyclone(
  prob$default, 
  fluid = prob$fluid, 
  delta = prob$delta, 
  intervals = prob$intervals, 
  cons.bound = prob$cons.bound)
c(1, rep(0, 8)) - values
```

## Computing feasibility ratios:

```{r}
feas_ratios(prob, sample.size = 1e4)
```

## Optimization:

```{r}
res <- opt_mo(prob)
```

## Means and deviations of geometrical parameters:

```{r}
param_stat(res)
```

## Plot:

```{r}
make_plot(res)
```
